message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to spend closer to $85.  Let me know if you're open to that price.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $87.50.
